posts.post_content:
Boone which is somewhat of a print error. The registration is significantly off in the front as you can see the lines for the infield and bases are stamped in the wrong spot.  The back registration is worse than the front. Not a severe error but they missed their mark causing registration issues.  Boones name and the rest of the blanket front is printed nicely and the blanket is clean with great color and 4 nice brown borders.

 



 
Price is net to me 
Boone       35.00


Add 5.00 for shipping with tracking
